Player History
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 3/3/1990 to a minor league contract.
Had first career hit (double) on 8/26/1990, off Doug Drabek (SD)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/29/1990, off Chuck Finley (CHC)...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 1990...
Traded from Florida to New York (M) on 2/6/1993 (Going to FLA: RF Darryl Strawberry. Going to NYM: P Jon Lieber, C Eric Christopherson, SS Bret Boone)...
Injured on 4/16/1993 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
